PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-12401997-08-280,  FAIT,  ,  , 
Precis(a) Approval of the entry by the Attorney General of Canada into an AGREEMENT with the REPUBLIC OF TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO ON THE SHARING OF FORFEITED ASSETS AND EQUIVALENT FUNDS, and (b) authority to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing either the Hon. A. Anne McLellan, Daniel A. Bellemare, or Michael F. Kergin to sign the said Agreement.
